home.info-text.p1: Currently, I am pursuing a part-time Master's degree in Computer Science at the
home.info-text.p2: and working as a full-stack developer in the automotive industry on the side.
project-text.homologation: Agile development of an ecosystem for the support and partial automation of complex certification processes for vehicles.
project-text.adf: Empirical development of a framework for modeling and deploying configurations for diagnosing vehicle sensor data based on microservices at the Institut für Softwaretechnik und Fahrzeuginformatik
project-text.skeditor: Editor for modeling, specifying, and validating skill graphs based on grammars. This includes implementing simulations of algorithms in the Unreal Engine.
project-text.fleet-calculation: Agile development of an expert application for modeling complex calculation pipelines to efficiently aggregate vast amounts of data for international calculation of vehicle fleets.
